alert.note: Alert for Yellowstone National Park (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 06 at 2:37PM MST until January 08 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional accumulations of 3 to 6 inches expected through tonight. Snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches, 6 to 12 inches across higher terrain, expected Friday afternoon through Saturday morning. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph will produce blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Yellowstone National Park. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel over passes will be difficult. Blowing snow is likely to significantly reduce visibility. People recreating in the backcountry could become disoriented.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, water, and a charger for your cell phone in case of an emergency. Call 5 1 1, to get the latest road conditions.
